mapper.insert: insert into integrashopping (productName, productDescription, coverUrl,sign_id) values (#{productName}, #{productDescription}, #{coverUrl},#{sign.id})
mapper.select: select id, productName, productDescription, coverUrl,sign_id from integrashopping
select sp.id,sp.productName,sp.productDescription,sp.coverUrl,sp.sign_id,s.id s_id,s.score s_score from integrashopping sp JOIN sign s ON sp.sign_id=s.id
